localizedMeta.description:
A physics calculation puzzle game, with a new sensation, hits the scene!

★ The rules are simple, slice the blocks and move the Ninjas to the front of the gate!
★ We have prepared stages that you can clear with a breeze, to stages that are so difficult that they will make you groan , but are still worth clearing.
★ A surprise after you clear the stage....challenge the coin-collecting and the clear time attack!

Your purpose as the chivalrous robber, is to borrow the treasure coin that the evil procurator is holding and divide it out between the poor people.
Clear all 60 stages that are colored by the four seasons, and aim to become the Ninja Master!

Package size: 25 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/Japanese

新感覚の物理演算・パズルゲーム、ここに登場!!

★ルールはシンプル、ブロックをスライスし、ニンジャを扉の前に動かそう！
★サクッとクリアのカンタンなステージはもちろん、思わず唸るやりがいのあるステージまで用意！
★ステージクリア後のお楽しみ……小判収集やクリアタイムアタックにチャレンジしよう！

義賊ニンジャである君の目的は、悪代官が隠しているお宝小判を拝借し、金に困った者に分け与えることだ。
春夏秋冬によって彩られた全60ステージをクリアし、目指せ、忍者マスター！
